title: U.S. consumer usage of mobile payments 2017
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Made a mobile payment and lowest at Response Sent money internationally.
The highest Response Made a mobile payment has 62.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Sent money internationally.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 64.0 is found at Response Made a mobile payment and the minimum is found at Sent money internationally where Response is 2.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Made a mobile payment and lowest at Response Sent money internationally.
The highest Response Made a mobile payment has 62.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response Sent money internationally.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Made a mobile payment has the highest Share of respondents and Sent money internationally has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Paid a bill has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 62.0.
The Response Made a mobile payment has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Paid a bill, and Purchase in-app or online. Down to the Response Sent money internationally which is the lowest.
The Response Made a mobile payment has 2.58 times more Share of respondents than average.
